title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1729/98 of 4 August 1998 fixing the advance on the aid for lemons for the 1998/99 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1729/98 of 4 August 1998 fixing the advance on the aid for lemons for the 1998/99 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1998/99 marketing year, the advance provided for in Article 14(2) of Regulation (EC) No 1169/97 shall amount to 31 % of the aid for lemons fixed in the Annex to Regulation (EC) No 2202/96.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from the 1998/99 marketing year.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 August 1998.
For the Commission
Monika WULF-MATHIES
Member of the Commission
